channel.title: Problem with map
channel.description:
Hello, as said in the subject title, I got a problem with the map.
I would like to modify it, but the problem here is: how do I modify it?
What I would like to know: 1. Is it possible to modify it 2. If yes, how do I modify it (if you can, show an exemple of what must be modified...) 3. Which tool I should use.
I searched on the forum and found no tutorials or topics on maps. And I searched on google too, same thing.
Thanks for your answers.
Ps. If you think my thread should be better written, please let me know. ( I'm not really english...)

item.title: Problem with map
item.dc:creator: @vert642 vert642
item.description:
@vert642 wrote:

Hello, as said in the subject title, I got a problem with the map.

I would like to modify it, but the problem here is: how do I modify it?

What I would like to know:

  1. Is it possible to modify it
  2. If yes, how do I modify it (if you can, show an exemple of what must be modified…)
  3. Which tool I should use.

I searched on the forum and found no tutorials or topics on maps.
And I searched on google too, same thing.

Thanks for your answers.

Ps. If you think my thread should be better written, please let me know. ( I’m not really english…)
